d.name: drizzle-kit@0.31.9
d.body: - drizzle-kit api improvements for D1 connections

d.name: v1.0.0-beta.15
v1.0.0-beta.14
d.body:
## Migrator update
The `migrator` now applies all changes that are missing in the database. Previously the migrator only looked for local migrations with a creation date later than the last migration applied in the database
Now it detects and applies all missing migrations

- Fixed `generate` and `pull` commands to display the `SQL file` instead of the `folder` path in the migration output message
> Your SQL migration ➜ path

## Bug fixed
- [[BUG]: Cache is not invalidated after table updates](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4677)
- [[BUG]: Composite index with sort outputs a malformed SQL](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4704)
- [[BUG]: db introspection generates broken schema.ts syntax](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4582)
- [`random` property is set on `Array.prototype` with `enumerable: true`](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4484)
- [Fixed error TS7056 appearing when using "declaration": true in defineRelations with reworked PgColumns](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5272)
- [[BUG]: mssql transaction is not a function](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5328)
- [Fixed an error when seeding a composite unique column that includes a foreign key](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4354)

- Postgres: `DROP INDEX` statement did not respect schema
- Restricted usage of async functions in sync drivers' transactions

d.name: 1.0.0-beta.13
1.0.0-beta.12
d.body:
## Breaking changes

- .generatedAlwaysAs() know only accepts **sql\``** and **() => sql\``**

## Improvements

`Postgresql` dialect now have extra schema errors in ts files on `generate` and `push` commands:
- `table_name_duplicate` - duplicate table name across schema
- `column_name_duplicate` - duplicate column name across table
- `enum_name_duplicate` - duplicate enum name across schema
- `enum_values_duplicate` - duplicate values inside enum
- `privilege_duplicate` - duplicate privilege name
- `role_duplicate` - duplicate role name
- `schema_name_duplicate` - duplicate schema name

`SQLite` dialect now have extra schema errors in ts files on `generate` and `push` commands:
- `conflict_column` - duplicate column name across table
- `conflict_fk` - duplicate fk name
- `conflict_index` - duplicate index name
- `conflict_pk` - duplicate pk name
- `table_no_columns` - table has no columns

## Bug fixes

- [[BUG]: drizzle-kit generate silently exits with code 1](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5263)
- [[BUG]:Unable to resolve module node:crypto](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5183)
- [[BUG]: The package at "node_modules/.bun/drizzle-orm@1.0.0-beta.2-6565b14+35e4bda3077d71da/node_modules/drizzle-orm/migrator.js" attempted to import the Node standard library module "node:crypto". It failed because the native React runtime does not include the Node standard library.](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5126)
- [[BUG]: Problem with backslash in check constraint](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4655)
- [[BUG]: drizzle-kit up throws error "Cannot convert undefined or null to object"](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5099)
- Fixed `bun-sqlite` `db.get(...)` returning data in array mode instead of object mode
- Fixed `effect-postgres` driver ignoring cache config option
- [[BUG]: Types do not allow for placeholder usage in onConflictDoUpdate.set](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/5084)
- [[BUG]: alias doesn't work with views (Postgres)](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4875)
- [[BUG]: `select()...for("...", { of: table })` uses qualified name of table](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4950)
- [[BUG]: arrayContains() generates incorrect SQL parameters for PostgreSQL, leading to operator does not exist: text[] @> record error](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4578)
- [[BUG]: Params not inlined for single-table selects](https://github.com/drizzle-team/drizzle-orm/issues/4612)
